com.nexmo.client

Class NexmoClient.NexmoClientConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nexmo.client.NexmoClient.NexmoClientConfig
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NexmoClient.Builder
    Enclosing class:
    NexmoClient

    public static class NexmoClient.NexmoClientConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    POJO which contains current configuration (has to be built by Builder). 
         NexmoClient client = new NexmoClient.Builder()
     .build(context, connectionListener);
    Optional parameters for Builder are: 
    .environmentHost(endpoint)            // default Config.ENDPOINT_PRODUCTION = "https://ws.nexmo.com"
    .endpointPath(endpointPath)           // default Config.ENDPOINT_PATH = "/rtc/"
    .imageProcessingServiceUrl(ips)       // default Config.IPS_ENDPOINT_PRODUCTION = "https://api.nexmo.com/v1/image"
    .logLevel(Log.ASSERT)                 // default Log.ASSERT(minimal output). For verbose logs use Log.VERBOSE
    .statsInterval(1000)                  // default call stats interval is 1000ms.
